Numerator.name: Has A1C
Numerator.description: Date and value of last A1C value

ClinicalReports.Numerator: select * from measurements m where m.demographicNo = '${demographic_no}' and m.type = 'A1C' order by dateObserved

Numerator.name: Patients that use an asthma reliever more than 4 times per week
Numerator.description: Patients who use Asthma reliever more than 4 times per week

ClinicalReports.Numerator: select * from measurements m where m.demographicNo = '${demographic_no}' and m.type = 'ANR' and m.dataField > 4 order by dateObserved

Numerator.name: Patients who have had an ER visit in the last 6 months
Numerator.description: Number of patient in the denom with at least one a1c test in the last 6months

ClinicalReports.Numerator: select * from measurements m where m.demographicNo = '${demographic_no}' and m.type = 'CERV' and m.dataField > 1 and dateObserved > DATE_SUB(now(),INTERVAL 6 Month) order by dateObserved

Numerator.name: Has Exacerbation plan
Numerator.description: Patients with an Exacerbation Plan

ClinicalReports.Numerator: select * from measurements m where m.demographicNo = '${demographic_no}' and m.type = 'EPR' and m.dataField = 'yes' order by dateObserved

Numerator.name: BMI over 30
Numerator.description: Patients with a BMI >= 30

ClinicalReports.Numerator: select * from measurements m where m.demographicNo = '${demographic_no}' and m.type = 'BMI' and m.dataField >= 30 order by dateObserved

Numerator.name: Has A1C in last 6 months
Numerator.description: Number of patient in the denom with at least one a1c test in the last 6months

ClinicalReports.Numerator: select * from measurements m where m.demographicNo = '${demographic_no}' and m.type = 'A1C' and dateObserved > DATE_SUB(now(),INTERVAL 6 Month)

Numerator.name: Has A1C in last 12 mths less than or equal to 0.07
Numerator.description: Number of patients in the denom with at least one a1c in last 12 mths less than or equal to 0.07

ClinicalReports.Numerator: select * from measurements m where m.demographicNo = '${demographic_no}' and m.type = 'A1C' and dateObserved > DATE_SUB(now(),INTERVAL 12 Month) and m.dataField <= 0.07

Numerator.name: Have DM documented self management targets
Numerator.description: Number of patients in the denom with documented self management targets set in last 12 mths

ClinicalReports.Numerator: select * from measurements m where m.demographicNo = '${demographic_no}' and m.type = 'DMSM' and dateObserved > DATE_SUB(now(),INTERVAL 12 Month) and m.dataField like 'yes'

Numerator.name: Number of DM patients with current ACE inhibitors or AARB meds
Numerator.description: Number of DM patients with current ACE inhibitors or AARB meds

ClinicalReports.Numerator: select distinct dx.demographic_no from dxresearch dx, demographic d, drugs where dx.dxresearch_code = '250' and dx.coding_system = 'icd9' and dx.status = 'A' and d.demographic_no = dx.demographic_no and d.patient_status = 'AC' and d.demographic_no = '${demographic_no}' and d.demographic_no = drugs.demographic_no and drugs.end_date >= now() and (drugs.GN like '%Lisinopril%' or drugs.BN like '%Zestril%' or drugs.BN like '%Prinvil%' or drugs.BN like '%Zestoretic%' or drugs.GN like '%Ramipril%' or drugs.BN like '%Altace%' or drugs.GN like '%Captopril%' or drugs.BN like '%Capoten%' or drugs.GN like '%Benazepril%' or drugs.BN like '%Lotensin%' or drugs.GN like '%Cilazapril%' or drugs.BN like '%Inhibace%' or drugs.GN like '%Enalapril%' or drugs.BN like '%Vasotec%' or drugs.BN like '%Vaseretic%' or drugs.GN like '%Fosinopril%' or drugs.BN like '%Monopril%' or drugs.GN like '%Perindopril%' or drugs.BN like '%Coversyl%' or drugs.GN like '%Quinapril%' or drugs.BN like '%Accupril%' or drugs.BN like '%Accuretic%' or drugs.GN like '%Trandolapril%' or drugs.BN like '%Mavik%' or drugs.GN like '%Irbesartan%' or drugs.BN like '%Avapro%' or drugs.BN like '%Avalide%' or drugs.GN like '%Losartan%' or drugs.BN like '%Cozaar%' or drugs.BN like '%Hyzaar%' or drugs.GN like '%Valsartan%' or drugs.BN like '%Diovan%' or drugs.GN like '%Candesartan%' or drugs.BN like '%Atacand%' or drugs.GN like '%Eprosartan%' or drugs.BN like '%Teveten%' or drugs.GN like '%Telmisartan%' or drugs.BN like '%Micardis%')

Numerator.name: Has LDL in last 12 months
Numerator.description: Number of patient in the denom with at least one LDL test in the last 12months

ClinicalReports.Numerator: select * from measurements m where m.demographicNo = '${demographic_no}' and m.type = 'LDL' and dateObserved > DATE_SUB(now(),INTERVAL 12 Month)

Numerator.name: Has LDL in last 6 months less than or equal to 2
Numerator.description: Number of patient in the denom with at least one LDL test in the last 6 months with a value less than or equal to 2

ClinicalReports.Numerator: select * from measurements m where m.demographicNo = '${demographic_no}' and m.type = 'LDL' and dateObserved > DATE_SUB(now(),INTERVAL 6 Month) and m.dataField <= 2.0

Numerator.name: Have Retinopathy screeing in last 24 months
Numerator.description: Number of patients in the denom with a Retinopathy done in last 24mths

ClinicalReports.Numerator: select * from measurements m where m.demographicNo = '${demographic_no}' and m.type = 'EYEE' and dateObserved > DATE_SUB(now(),INTERVAL 24 Month) and m.dataField like 'yes'

Numerator.name: Have Foot Exam in last 12 months
Numerator.description: Number of patients in the denom with a foot exam done in last 24mths

ClinicalReports.Numerator: select * from measurements m where m.demographicNo = '${demographic_no}' and m.type = 'FTE' and dateObserved > DATE_SUB(now(),INTERVAL 12 Month) and m.dataField like 'yes'

Numerator.name: Have ACR screening in last 12 months
Numerator.description: Number of patients in the denom with microalbuminuria screeing done in last 24mths

ClinicalReports.Numerator: select * from measurements m where m.demographicNo = '${demographic_no}' and m.type = 'ACR' and dateObserved > DATE_SUB(now(),INTERVAL 12 Month)

Numerator.name: Has BP in last 6 months
Numerator.description: Number of patient in the denom with at least one bp test in the last 6months

ClinicalReports.Numerator: select * from measurements m where m.demographicNo = '${demographic_no}' and m.type = 'BP' and dateObserved > DATE_SUB(now(),INTERVAL 6 Month)

Numerator.name: Has Triple Indicator in guideline time limit
Numerator.description: Number of patient in the denom with at least one a1c test in the last 6 months and at least one bp test in the last 6 months and at least one LDL test in the last 12 months

ClinicalReports.Numerator: select * from measurements m,measurements m2,measurements m3 where m.demographicNo = '${demographic_no}' and m.type = 'BP' and m.dateObserved > DATE_SUB(now(),INTERVAL 6 Month) and m2.demographicNo = '${demographic_no}' and m2.type = 'LDL' and m2.dateObserved > DATE_SUB(now(),INTERVAL 12 Month) and m3.demographicNo = '${demographic_no}' and m3.type = 'A1C' and m3.dateObserved > DATE_SUB(now(),INTERVAL 6 Month)

Numerator.name: Female
Numerator.description: Number of Women in the denom

ClinicalReports.Numerator: select * from demographic where demographic_no = '${demographic_no}' and sex = 'F'

Numerator.name: Male
Numerator.description: Number of Men in the denom

ClinicalReports.Numerator: select * from demographic where demographic_no = '${demographic_no}' and sex = 'M'

Numerator.name: 19 and younger
Numerator.description: Number of patient in the denom 19 and younger

ClinicalReports.Numerator: select * from demographic d where demographic_no = '${demographic_no}' and DATE_FORMAT(CONCAT( (d.year_of_birth),'-',(d.month_of_birth),'-',(d.date_of_birth)),'%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_SUB(now(),INTERVAL 19 Year)

Numerator.name: 20 to 64
Numerator.description: Number of patient in the denom 20 to 64

ClinicalReports.Numerator: select * from demographic d where d.demographic_no = '${demographic_no}' and DATE_FORMAT(CONCAT( (d.year_of_birth),'-',(d.month_of_birth),'-',(d.date_of_birth)),'%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_SUB(now(),INTERVAL 20 Year) and DATE_FORMAT(CONCAT( (d.year_of_birth),'-',(d.month_of_birth),'-',(d.date_of_birth)),'%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_SUB(now(),INTERVAL 64 Year)

Numerator.name: 65 and older
Numerator.description: Number of patients in the denom 65 and older

ClinicalReports.Numerator: select * from demographic d where demographic_no = '${demographic_no}' and DATE_FORMAT(CONCAT( (d.year_of_birth),'-',(d.month_of_birth),'-',(d.date_of_birth)),'%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_SUB(now(),INTERVAL 65 Year)

Numerator.name: Mammogram in past 12m
Numerator.description: Number of patients in the denom that have a mam test in the last 12 months

ClinicalReports.Numerator: select * from preventions where prevention_type ='MAM' and demographic_no = '${demographic_no}' and prevention_date >= DATE_SUB(now(),INTERVAL 12 Month)

Numerator.name: Pap in past 36m
Numerator.description: Number of patients in the denom that have a pat test in the last 36 months

ClinicalReports.Numerator: select * from preventions where prevention_type ='PAP' and demographic_no = '${demographic_no}' and prevention_date >= DATE_SUB(now(),INTERVAL 36 Month)

Numerator.name: FOBT within 2 years or Colonoscopy within 5 years
Numerator.description: Number of patients in the denom that have an FOBT within 2 years or with a colonoscopy within 5 years

ClinicalReports.Numerator: select d.demographic_no from demographic d, preventions p where d.demographic_no = '${demographic_no}' and (YEAR(CURRENT_DATE)-YEAR(DATE_FORMAT(CONCAT((d.year_of_birth), '-', (d.month_of_birth),'-',(d.date_of_birth)),'%Y-%m-%d')))-(RIGHT(CURRENT_DATE,5)<RIGHT(DATE_FORMAT(CONCAT((d.year_of_birth), '-', (d.month_of_birth),'-',(d.date_of_birth)),'%Y-%m-%d'),5)) >= 50 and (YEAR(CURRENT_DATE)-YEAR(DATE_FORMAT(CONCAT((d.year_of_birth), '-', (d.month_of_birth),'-',(d.date_of_birth)),'%Y-%m-%d')))-(RIGHT(CURRENT_DATE,5)<RIGHT(DATE_FORMAT(CONCAT((d.year_of_birth), '-', (d.month_of_birth),'-',(d.date_of_birth)),'%Y-%m-%d'),5)) <= 74 and d.patient_status = 'AC' and d.demographic_no = p.demographic_no and ((p.prevention_type like 'FOBT' and p.prevention_date >= date_sub(curdate(),interval 730 day)) or (p.prevention_type like 'COLONOSCOPY' and p.prevention_date >= date_sub(curdate(),interval 1826 day))) and p.deleted != 1 order by p.prevention_date

Numerator.name: Positive FOBT within 2 years and Colonoscopy within 2 weeks of test results
Numerator.description: Number of patients in the denom that have a positive FOBT within 2 years and referral for colonoscopy within 2 weeks of test results

ClinicalReports.Numerator: select d.demographic_no, d.last_name, d.first_name,p.creation_date from demographic d, preventions p, preventionsExt pext where d.demographic_no = '${demographic_no}' and (YEAR(CURRENT_DATE)-YEAR(DATE_FORMAT(CONCAT((d.year_of_birth), '-', (d.month_of_birth),'-',(d.date_of_birth)),'%Y-%m-%d')))-(RIGHT(CURRENT_DATE,5) < RIGHT(DATE_FORMAT(CONCAT((d.year_of_birth), '-', (d.month_of_birth),'-',(d.date_of_birth)),'%Y-%m-%d'),5)) >= 50 and (YEAR(CURRENT_DATE)-YEAR(DATE_FORMAT(CONCAT((d.year_of_birth), '-', (d.month_of_birth),'-',(d.date_of_birth)),'%Y-%m-%d')))-(RIGHT(CURRENT_DATE,5) < RIGHT(DATE_FORMAT(CONCAT((d.year_of_birth), '-', (d.month_of_birth),'-',(d.date_of_birth)),'%Y-%m-%d'),5)) <=74 and d.patient_status = 'AC' and d.demographic_no = p.demographic_no and p.prevention_type like 'FOBT' and p.id = pext.prevention_id and pext.keyval = 'result' and pext.val = 'abnormal' and p.prevention_date >= date_sub(curdate(),interval 730 day) and p.deleted = 0 and (d.demographic_no in (select demographicNo from consultationRequests cr, consultationServices cs where cs.serviceDesc = 'Gastroenterology' and cr.serviceId = cs.serviceId and cr.reason like '%FOBT%' and cr.demographicNo = p.demographic_no and datediff(cr.referalDate,p.creation_date) <= 14) or d.demographic_no in (select demographicNo from consultationRequests cr, consultationServices cs where cs.serviceDesc = 'Surgery - General' and cr.serviceId = cs.serviceId and cr.reason like '%FOBT%' and cr.demographicNo = p.demographic_no and datediff(cr.referalDate,p.creation_date) <= 14) or d.demographic_no in (select demographicNo from consultationRequests cr, consultationServices cs where cs.serviceDesc = 'General Surgery' and cr.serviceId = cs.serviceId and cr.reason like '%FOBT%' and cr.demographicNo = p.demographic_no and datediff(cr.referalDate,p.creation_date) <= 14) or d.demographic_no in (select demographic_no from eform_data frm where frm.demographic_no = p.demographic_no and frm.form_name = 'Colonoscopy Clinic Referral' and datediff(frm.form_date,p.creation_date) <= 14))

Numerator.name: A1C lower than 0.07
Numerator.description: Number of patient in the denom with a a1c lower that 0.071

Numerator.name: A1C higher than 0.079
Numerator.description: Number of patient in the denom with a a1c higher that 0.079

Numerator.name: BP lower than 131
Numerator.description: Number of patient in the denom with a bp lower that 131

Numerator.name: BP lower than or equal to 130/80
Numerator.description: Number of patient in the denom with a bp lower than or equal to 130/80

Numerator.name: BP higher than 139
Numerator.description: Number of patient in the denom with a bp higher that 139

Numerator.name: LDL lower than 2.5
Numerator.description: Number of patient in the denom with a LDL lower that 2.6

Numerator.name: Triple Indicator with last values in target
Numerator.description: Number of patient in the denom with a A1C lower 0.07 and BP lower 131 and LDL lower 2.5

Numerator.name: CD4 lower than 200
Numerator.description: Number of patient in the denom with a cd4 lower than 200

Numerator.name: CD4 inbetween 200-350
Numerator.description: Number of patient in the denom with a cd4 inbetween 200-350

Numerator.name: CD4 higher than 350
Numerator.description: Number of patient in the denom with a cd4 higher that 350

Numerator.name: Measurement Values
Numerator.description: Number of patient with a selected measurement at a certain value

Denominator.name: Diabetes Registry
Denominator.description: Number of patients in DM reg

ClinicalReports.Denominator: select distinct dx.demographic_no from dxresearch dx, demographic d where dx.dxresearch_code in ('250') and dx.coding_system = 'icd9' and dx.status = 'A' and d.demographic_no = dx.demographic_no and d.patient_status = 'AC'

Denominator.name: Diabetes Registry by practice
Denominator.description: Number of patient in DM reg by practice

ClinicalReports.Denominator: select distinct dxresearch.demographic_no from dxresearch, demographic where dxresearch_code in ('250') and coding_system = 'icd9' and dxresearch.status = 'A' and dxresearch.demographic_no = demographic.demographic_no and demographic.provider_no = '${provider_no}' and demographic.patient_status = 'AC'

Denominator.name: Diabetes Registry having HbA1c in last 6m
Denominator.description: Number of patient in the DM reg that have a HbA1c in the testing range

ClinicalReports.Denominator: select distinct dx.demographic_no from dxresearch dx, measurements m, demographic d where dx.dxresearch_code in ('250') and dx.coding_system = 'icd9' and dx.status = 'A' and dx.demographic_no = m.demographicNo and m.type = 'A1C' and dateObserved > DATE_SUB(now(),INTERVAL 6 Month) and d.demographic_no = dx.demographic_no and d.patient_status = 'AC'

Denominator.name: Diabetes Registry having HbA1c in last 6m by practice
Denominator.description: Number of patient in the DM reg that have a HbA1c in the testing range by practice

ClinicalReports.Denominator: select distinct d.demographic_no from dxresearch d, measurements m,demographic de where d.dxresearch_code in ('250') and d.coding_system = 'icd9' and d.status = 'A' and d.demographic_no = m.demographicNo and m.type = 'A1C' and dateObserved > DATE_SUB(now(),INTERVAL 6 Month) and d.demographic_no = de.demographic_no and de.provider_no = '${provider_no}' and de.demographic_no = d.demographic_no and de.patient_status = 'AC'

Denominator.name: Diabetes Registry having HbA1c in last 12m
Denominator.description: Number of patient in the DM reg that have a HbA1c in the testing range

ClinicalReports.Denominator: select distinct dx.demographic_no from dxresearch dx, measurements m, demographic d where dx.dxresearch_code in ('250') and dx.coding_system = 'icd9' and dx.status = 'A' and dx.demographic_no = m.demographicNo and m.type = 'A1C' and dateObserved > DATE_SUB(now(),INTERVAL 12 Month) and d.demographic_no = dx.demographic_no and d.patient_status = 'AC'

Denominator.name: Diabetes Registry having HbA1c in last 12m by practice
Denominator.description: Number of patient in the DM reg that have a HbA1c in the testing range by practice

ClinicalReports.Denominator: select distinct d.demographic_no from dxresearch d, measurements m,demographic de where d.dxresearch_code in ('250') and d.coding_system = 'icd9' and d.status = 'A' and d.demographic_no = m.demographicNo and m.type = 'A1C' and dateObserved > DATE_SUB(now(),INTERVAL 12 Month) and d.demographic_no = de.demographic_no and de.provider_no = '${provider_no}' and de.demographic_no = d.demographic_no and de.patient_status = 'AC'

Denominator.name: Diabetes Registry having BP in last 6m
Denominator.description: Number of patient in the DM reg that have a BP in the testing range

ClinicalReports.Denominator: select distinct dx.demographic_no from dxresearch dx, measurements m, demographic d where dx.dxresearch_code in ('250') and dx.coding_system = 'icd9' and dx.status = 'A' and dx.demographic_no = m.demographicNo and m.type = 'BP' and dateObserved > DATE_SUB(now(),INTERVAL 6 Month) and d.demographic_no = dx.demographic_no and d.patient_status = 'AC'

Denominator.name: Diabetes Registry having BP in last 6m by practice
Denominator.description: Number of patient in the DM reg that have a BP in the testing range by practice

ClinicalReports.Denominator: select distinct d.demographic_no from dxresearch d, measurements m,demographic de where d.dxresearch_code in ('250') and d.coding_system = 'icd9' and d.status = 'A' and d.demographic_no = m.demographicNo and m.type = 'BP' and dateObserved > DATE_SUB(now(),INTERVAL 6 Month) and d.demographic_no = de.demographic_no and de.provider_no = '${provider_no}' and de.demographic_no = d.demographic_no and de.patient_status = 'AC'

Denominator.name: Diabetes Registry having LDL in last 12m
Denominator.description: Number of patient in the DM reg that have a LDL in the testing range

ClinicalReports.Denominator: select distinct dx.demographic_no from dxresearch dx, measurements m,demographic d where dx.dxresearch_code in ('250') and dx.coding_system = 'icd9' and dx.status = 'A' and dx.demographic_no = m.demographicNo and m.type = 'LDL' and dateObserved > DATE_SUB(now(),INTERVAL 12 Month) and d.demographic_no = dx.demographic_no and d.patient_status = 'AC'

Denominator.name: Diabetes Registry having LDL in last 12m by practice
Denominator.description: Number of patient in the DM reg that have a LDL in the testing range by practice

ClinicalReports.Denominator: select distinct d.demographic_no from dxresearch d, measurements m,demographic de where d.dxresearch_code in ('250') and d.coding_system = 'icd9' and d.status = 'A' and d.demographic_no = m.demographicNo and m.type = 'LDL' and dateObserved > DATE_SUB(now(),INTERVAL 12 Month) and d.demographic_no = de.demographic_no and de.provider_no = '${provider_no}' and de.demographic_no = d.demographic_no and de.patient_status = 'AC'

Denominator.name: Diabetes Registry having LDL in last 6m by practice
Denominator.description: Number of patient in the DM reg that have a LDL in the testing range by practice

ClinicalReports.Denominator: select distinct d.demographic_no from dxresearch d, measurements m,demographic de where d.dxresearch_code in ('250') and d.coding_system = 'icd9' and d.status = 'A' and d.demographic_no = m.demographicNo and m.type = 'LDL' and dateObserved > DATE_SUB(now(),INTERVAL 6 Month) and d.demographic_no = de.demographic_no and de.provider_no = '${provider_no}' and de.demographic_no = d.demographic_no and de.patient_status = 'AC'

Denominator.name: Diabetes Registry having LDL less than 2 in last 6m by practice
Denominator.description: Number of patient in the DM reg that have a LDL in the testing range

ClinicalReports.Denominator: select distinct d.demographic_no from dxresearch d, measurements m,demographic de where d.dxresearch_code in ('250') and d.coding_system = 'icd9' and d.status = 'A' and d.demographic_no = m.demographicNo and m.type = 'LDL' and dateObserved > DATE_SUB(now(),INTERVAL 6 Month) and m.dataField <= 2.0 and d.demographic_no = de.demographic_no and de.provider_no = '${provider_no}' and de.demographic_no = d.demographic_no and de.patient_status = 'AC'

Denominator.name: Diabetes Registry having BP test in last 12m
Denominator.description: Number of patient in the DM reg that have a Blood Pressure test in last 12 months

ClinicalReports.Denominator: select distinct d.demographic_no from dxresearch d, measurements m,demographic de where d.dxresearch_code in ('250') and d.coding_system = 'icd9' and d.status = 'A' and d.demographic_no = m.demographicNo and m.type = 'BP' and dateObserved > DATE_SUB(now(),INTERVAL 12 Month) and d.demographic_no = de.demographic_no and de.demographic_no = d.demographic_no and de.patient_status = 'AC'

Denominator.name: Diabetes Registry having BP test in last 12m by practice
Denominator.description: Number of patient in the DM reg for a practice that have a Blood Pressure test in last 12 months

ClinicalReports.Denominator: select distinct d.demographic_no from dxresearch d, measurements m,demographic de where d.dxresearch_code in ('250') and d.coding_system = 'icd9' and d.status = 'A' and d.demographic_no = m.demographicNo and m.type = 'BP' and dateObserved > DATE_SUB(now(),INTERVAL 12 Month) and d.demographic_no = de.demographic_no and de.provider_no = '${provider_no}' and de.demographic_no = d.demographic_no and de.patient_status = 'AC'

Denominator.name: Diabetes Registry having Triple Indicator in guideline time limit
Denominator.description: And a combined one above (Triple Indicator)

ClinicalReports.Denominator: select distinct dx.demographic_no from measurements m,measurements m2,measurements m3,dxresearch dx, demographic d where m.demographicNo = dx.demographic_no and m.type = 'BP' and m.dateObserved >= DATE_SUB(now(),INTERVAL 6 Month) and m2.demographicNo = dx.demographic_no and m2.type = 'LDL' and m2.dateObserved >= DATE_SUB(now(),INTERVAL 12 Month) and m3.demographicNo = dx.demographic_no and m3.type = 'A1C' and m3.dateObserved >= DATE_SUB(now(),INTERVAL 6 Month) and dx.dxresearch_code in ('250') and dx.coding_system = 'icd9' and dx.status = 'A' and d.demographic_no = dx.demographic_no and d.patient_status = 'AC'

Denominator.name: Diabetes Registry having Triple Indicator in guideline time limit by practice
Denominator.description: And a combined one above (Triple Indicator) by practice

ClinicalReports.Denominator: select distinct d.demographic_no from measurements m,measurements m2,measurements m3,dxresearch d,demographic de where m.demographicNo = d.demographic_no and m.type = 'BP' and m.dateObserved >= DATE_SUB(now(),INTERVAL 6 Month) and m2.demographicNo = d.demographic_no and m2.type = 'LDL' and m2.dateObserved >= DATE_SUB(now(),INTERVAL 12 Month) and m3.demographicNo = d.demographic_no and m3.type = 'A1C' and m3.dateObserved >= DATE_SUB(now(),INTERVAL 6 Month) and d.dxresearch_code in ('250') and d.coding_system = 'icd9' and d.status = 'A' and d.demographic_no = de.demographic_no and de.provider_no = '${provider_no}' and de.demographic_no = d.demographic_no and de.patient_status = 'AC'

Denominator.name: Active Patients
Denominator.description: Number of active patients

ClinicalReports.Denominator: select distinct demographic_no from demographic where patient_status = 'AC'

Denominator.name: Active Patients by practice
Denominator.description: Number of active patients by practice

ClinicalReports.Denominator: select distinct demographic_no from demographic where patient_status = 'AC' and provider_no = '${provider_no}'

Denominator.name: Congestive Heart Failure Registry
Denominator.description: Number of patients in the Congestive heart failure

ClinicalReports.Denominator: select distinct dx.demographic_no from dxresearch dx, demographic d where dx.dxresearch_code in ('428') and dx.coding_system = 'icd9' and dx.status = 'A' and dx.demographic_no = d.demographic_no and d.patient_status = 'AC'

Denominator.name: Congestive Heart Failure Registry by practice
Denominator.description: Number of patients in the Congestive heart failure by provider

ClinicalReports.Denominator: select distinct dxresearch.demographic_no from dxresearch ,demographic where dxresearch_code in ('428') and coding_system = 'icd9' and dxresearch.status = 'A' and dxresearch.demographic_no = demographic.demographic_no and demographic.provider_no = '${provider_no}' and demographic.patient_status = 'AC'

Denominator.name: Asthma Registry
Denominator.description: Number of patients in the Asthma

ClinicalReports.Denominator: select distinct dx.demographic_no from dxresearch dx, demographic d where dx.dxresearch_code in ('493') and dx.coding_system = 'icd9' and dx.status = 'A' and dx.demographic_no = d.demographic_no and d.patient_status = 'AC'

Denominator.name: Asthma Registry by practice
Denominator.description: Number of patients in the Asthma by provider

ClinicalReports.Denominator: select distinct dxresearch.demographic_no from dxresearch ,demographic where dxresearch_code in ('493') and coding_system = 'icd9' and dxresearch.status = 'A' and dxresearch.demographic_no = demographic.demographic_no and demographic.provider_no = '${provider_no}' and demographic.patient_status = 'AC'

Denominator.name: COPD Registry
Denominator.description: Number of patients in the COPD

ClinicalReports.Denominator: select distinct dx.demographic_no from dxresearch dx, demographic d where dx.dxresearch_code in ('491') and dx.coding_system = 'icd9' and dx.status = 'A' and dx.demographic_no = d.demographic_no and d.patient_status = 'AC'

Denominator.name: COPD Registry by practice
Denominator.description: Number of patients in the COPD by provider

ClinicalReports.Denominator: select distinct dxresearch.demographic_no from dxresearch ,demographic where dxresearch_code in ('491') and coding_system = 'icd9' and dxresearch.status = 'A' and dxresearch.demographic_no = demographic.demographic_no and demographic.provider_no = '${provider_no}' and demographic.patient_status = 'AC'

Denominator.name: Hypertension Registry
Denominator.description: Number of patient in the Hypertension reg

ClinicalReports.Denominator: select distinct dx.demographic_no from dxresearch dx, demographic d where dx.dxresearch_code in ('401') and dx.coding_system = 'icd9' and dx.status = 'A' and dx.demographic_no = d.demographic_no and d.patient_status = 'AC'

Denominator.name: Hypertension Registry by practice
Denominator.description: Number of patient in the Hypertension reg by provider

ClinicalReports.Denominator: select distinct dxresearch.demographic_no from dxresearch,demographic where dxresearch_code in ('401') and coding_system = 'icd9' and dxresearch.status = 'A' and dxresearch.demographic_no = demographic.demographic_no and demographic.provider_no = '${provider_no}' and demographic.patient_status = 'AC'

Denominator.name: HIV Registry
Denominator.description: Number of patient in the HIV reg

ClinicalReports.Denominator: select distinct dx.demographic_no from dxresearch dx, demographic d where dx.dxresearch_code in ('042') and dx.coding_system = 'icd9' and dx.status = 'A' and dx.demographic_no = d.demographic_no and d.patient_status = 'AC'

Denominator.name: Positive FOBT within 2 years for ages 50 to 74
Denominator.description: Number of patients with positive FOBT in the system between ages 50 to 74

ClinicalReports.Denominator: select d.demographic_no from demographic d, preventions p, preventionsExt pext where d.provider_no = '${provider_no}' and d.demographic_no = p.demographic_no and (YEAR(CURRENT_DATE)-YEAR(DATE_FORMAT(CONCAT((d.year_of_birth), '-', (d.month_of_birth),'-',(d.date_of_birth)),'%Y-%m-%d')))-(RIGHT(CURRENT_DATE,5) < RIGHT(DATE_FORMAT(CONCAT((d.year_of_birth), '-', (d.month_of_birth),'-',(d.date_of_birth)),'%Y-%m-%d'),5)) >= 50 and (YEAR(CURRENT_DATE)-YEAR(DATE_FORMAT(CONCAT((d.year_of_birth), '-', (d.month_of_birth),'-',(d.date_of_birth)),'%Y-%m-%d')))-(RIGHT(CURRENT_DATE,5) < RIGHT(DATE_FORMAT(CONCAT((d.year_of_birth), '-', (d.month_of_birth),'-',(d.date_of_birth)),'%Y-%m-%d'),5)) <=74 and d.patient_status = 'AC' and p.prevention_type like 'FOBT' and p.id = pext.prevention_id and pext.keyval = 'result' and pext.val = 'abnormal' and p.prevention_date >= date_sub(curdate(),interval 730 day) and p.deleted = 0

Denominator.name: Everyone between 50 and 74
Denominator.description: Total number of adults aged 50 to 74

ClinicalReports.Denominator: select distinct demographic_no from demographic d where DATE_FORMAT(CONCAT( (d.year_of_birth),'-',(d.month_of_birth),'-',(d.date_of_birth)),'%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_SUB(now(),INTERVAL 50 Year) and DATE_FORMAT(CONCAT( (d.year_of_birth),'-',(d.month_of_birth),'-',(d.date_of_birth)),'%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_SUB(now(),INTERVAL 74 Year) and patient_status = 'AC'

Denominator.name: Everyone between 50 and 74 by practice
Denominator.description: Total number of adults aged between 50 and 74 in an individual physician’s patient panel

ClinicalReports.Denominator: select distinct demographic_no from demographic d where DATE_FORMAT(CONCAT( (d.year_of_birth),'-',(d.month_of_birth),'-',(d.date_of_birth)),'%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_SUB(now(),INTERVAL 50 Year) and DATE_FORMAT(CONCAT( (d.year_of_birth),'-',(d.month_of_birth),'-',(d.date_of_birth)),'%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_SUB(now(),INTERVAL 74 Year) and d.provider_no = '${provider_no}' and patient_status = 'AC'

Denominator.name: Women 50 and over
Denominator.description: Total number of women aged 50 and over

ClinicalReports.Denominator: select distinct demographic_no from demographic d where sex = 'F' and DATE_FORMAT(CONCAT( (d.year_of_birth),'-',(d.month_of_birth),'-',(d.date_of_birth)),'%Y-%m-%d') < DATE_SUB(now(),INTERVAL 50 Year) and patient_status = 'AC'

Denominator.name: Women 50 and over by practice
Denominator.description: Total number of women aged 50 and over in an individual physician’s patient panel

ClinicalReports.Denominator: select distinct demographic_no from demographic d where sex = 'F' and DATE_FORMAT(CONCAT( (d.year_of_birth),'-',(d.month_of_birth),'-',(d.date_of_birth)),'%Y-%m-%d') < DATE_SUB(now(),INTERVAL 50 Year) and d.provider_no = '${provider_no}' and patient_status = 'AC'

Denominator.name: Women 18-69
Denominator.description: Total number of women patients aged 18 to 69 years, who have not had a hysterectomy

ClinicalReports.Denominator: select distinct demographic_no from demographic d where sex = 'F' and DATE_FORMAT(CONCAT( (d.year_of_birth),'-',(d.month_of_birth),'-',(d.date_of_birth)),'%Y-%m-%d') > DATE_SUB(now(),INTERVAL 69 Year) and DATE_FORMAT(CONCAT( (d.year_of_birth),'-',(d.month_of_birth),'-',(d.date_of_birth)),'%Y-%m-%d') < DATE_SUB(now(),INTERVAL 18 Year) and patient_status = 'AC'

Denominator.name: Women 18-69 by practice
Denominator.description: Total number of women patients aged 18 to 69 years, who have not had a hysterectomy, in an individual physician’s patient panel

ClinicalReports.Denominator: select distinct demographic_no from demographic d where sex = 'F' and DATE_FORMAT(CONCAT( (d.year_of_birth),'-',(d.month_of_birth),'-',(d.date_of_birth)),'%Y-%m-%d') > DATE_SUB(now(),INTERVAL 69 Year) and DATE_FORMAT(CONCAT( (d.year_of_birth),'-',(d.month_of_birth),'-',(d.date_of_birth)),'%Y-%m-%d') < DATE_SUB(now(),INTERVAL 18 Year) and d.provider_no = '${provider_no}' and patient_status = 'AC'
